name: Opus Mortem
description: Play as the Death. Test your reflexes while trying to redirect souls to their respective destinations. Don't worry if it's a bit hard at the beginning, every work gets easier with time and experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2 GHz dual core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Hardware-accelerated OpenGL or OpenGL ES Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 52 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum resolution of 940x600
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware-accelerated OpenGL or OpenGL ES Storage: 52 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum resolution of 940x600
